name: Bluewire Solutions
tagline: Wokingham IT Support and Services Company
description: Bluewire Solutions offers latest cutting edge technology to ensure the burden from IT can be lifted whilst providing a return on investment (ROI) in the long run. Our breadth of in-house expertise and experience across a broad range of industries allows us to be truly flexible when tailoring our top of the range IT services to the individual needs and wants of our clients within any available budget.
